Uses of Interface
com.jalios.jstore.StoreListener

  • Packages that use StoreListener 
    Package Description
    com.jalios.jcms
    Contains the core JPlatform classes.
    com.jalios.jcms.accesscontrol  
    com.jalios.jcms.authentication.cookie  
    com.jalios.jcms.db  
    com.jalios.jcms.fileprocessor  
    com.jalios.jcms.jportal  
    com.jalios.jcms.mashup
    Contains classes used for data Import/Export.
    com.jalios.jcms.search
    Provides internal search engines classes of JPlatform.
    com.jalios.jcms.workspace
    Contains classes about workspace features.
    com.jalios.jstore
    Contains JStore core classes.

    • Uses of StoreListener in com.jalios.jcms

      Classes in com.jalios.jcms that implement StoreListener 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractFileIndexListener
      This abstract class is implemented by generated.FileIndexListener
      class  AbstractLinkIndexListener
      This abstract class is implemented by generated.LinkIndexListener
      class  AudienceRights
      This class manages a Member's read right on publication using their categories.
      class  BasicStoreListener
      This class is a neutral implementation of StoreListener.
      class  CacheManager
      This class manages the cache of content fragments.
      class  CategoryListener  
      class  DataListener
      This class listens to mutations of Data objects.
      static class  DescriptiveURLs.DescriptiveURLsListener  
      class  FileDocumentListener
      This class listens to mutation of FileDocument objects.
      class  FileDocumentVersionListener  
      class  GroupListener
      This class listens to mutations of Group instances.
      class  JSyncDataListener
      This class monitors writes stablization.
      class  LimitControllerListener  
      class  MemberListener
      This class listens to mutations of Member and DBMember instances.
      class  MemberSearchEngineListener
      Listen to create/update/delete of DBMember
      class  PublicationListener
      This class listens to mutations of Publication objects.
      class  WeakLinkManager
      This class manages the index of weak references on publications.
      class  WFPublicationListener
      This class listens to mutations of Publication objects and manages Workflow's resources (State's action, alarms, ...)
      class  WKRoleListener
      This class represent a Listener for WKRole Objects.
      Methods in com.jalios.jcms that return types with arguments of type StoreListener 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,​java.util.Set<StoreListener>> Channel.getStoreListenerClassMap()
      Returns the map class/StoreListener.
      java.util.Set<StoreListener> Channel.getStoreListenerSet()
      Returns the set of StoreListener listening for all data.
      Methods in com.jalios.jcms with parameters of type StoreListener 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Channel.addStoreListener​(StoreListener listener, boolean repeat)
      Adds a StoreListener for all storable classes.
      void Channel.addStoreListener​(StoreListener listener, java.lang.Class<?> clazz, boolean repeat)
      Adds a StoreListener associated to a given class.
      void Channel.removeStoreListener​(StoreListener listener)
      Removes a StoreListener for all storable classes.
      void Channel.removeStoreListener​(StoreListener listener, java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      Removes a StoreListener associated to a given class.

    • Uses of StoreListener in com.jalios.jcms.search

      Classes in com.jalios.jcms.search that implement StoreListener 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CategorySearchEngineListener
      This class listen to all operations on Category and ask the Category Search Engine to index/update/delete.
      class  PublicationSearchEngineListener
      This class listen to all operations on Publication and ask the Publication Search Engine to index/update/delete.

      This class represent a Listener for Workspace Objects

      This class is a StoreListener used to set a workspace for a given WSTypeEntry.
